info.description:
Welcome to Flyff Universe Public API! The API is still in development and specifications can change as well as the main URL. Check Flyff Official Fansite Kit for high-quality 2D assets. Contact the developers by mail or on the official Discord if you have questions, suggestions, or a bug to report. Copyright 2021-2022 © Gala Lab Corp. All Rights Reserved. Permission to use the data and images granted only for information sites and tools about the official game. Gala Lab reserves the right to no longer grant this permission at any time. Commercial use strictly prohibited. Use for in-game automation and cheating tools, or use in any other video game is strictly prohibited. Please contact the developers if you wish to verify that your use of this API is in accordance with the copyright.
# Introduction Currently limited to 300 calls per minute per IP. No size limitation on the request and the response. Feel free to cache the results and fetch the data only when the data version changes. Version History:
  • 1.0.0 - 2021/03/17 - Initial version. Class, NPC and Place basic information.
  • 1.1.0 - 2021/07/19 - World, Monster, Item, Skill, Element and Language. Added more Class and Place icons.
  • 1.1.1 - 2021/08/01 - Monster experience and bug fixes.
  • 1.1.2 - 2021/09/06 - Karma levels, Boss Monsters spawns and more Monster Attack information.
  • 1.2.0 - 2021/11/03 - Party Skill, Quest and Achievement.
  • 1.2.1 - 2022/05/03 - Upgrade level bonus and bug fixes.
info.title: Flyff Universe API

get.summary: Get the version of the game data
get.description: Returns an unique ID representing the current version of the static game data

get.summary: Get the version of the game API
get.description: Returns the current version of the game API
Returns an array containing the ID of all available classes
Returns a single class

get.summary: Find classes by a list of IDs
get.description: Returns an array with classes

parameters.name: classIds
parameters.description: IDs of classes to return separated by comma ,

get.description: Returns icon for the specified file name

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: Style of the icon. Accepted values: messenger, old_female, old_male, target.

get.description: Returns an array containing the ID of all available NPCs
Returns a single NPC

get.summary: Find NPCs by a list of IDs
get.description: Returns an array with NPCs

parameters.name: npcIds
parameters.description: IDs of NPCs to return separated by comma ,

get.description: Returns image for the specified file name
Returns an array containing the ID of all available Quests

parameters.name: questIds
parameters.description: IDs of Quests to return separated by comma ,

get.description: Returns an array containing all the bonus per upgrade level

Returns flag for the specified file name

minLevel.description: Minimum player level for the Class

maxLevel.description: Maximum player level for the Class

maxHP.description: Formula to compute the maximum Hit Points of the player

maxFP.description: Formula to compute the maximum Fatigue Points of the player

maxMP.description: Formula to compute the maximum Mana Points of the player

locations.description: Locations where you can find the NPC

repeatable.description: Whether the Quest can be completed several times or not

removable.description: Whether the Quest can be removed by the player or not

partyShare.description: Whether monster kill count and item drops are shared across party members on the same Quest or not

beginNPC.description: ID of the NPC launching the Quest

minLevel.description: Minimum level required to begin the Quest

maxLevel.description: Maximum level required to begin the Quest

beginClasses.description: List of player Classes able to begin the Quest

beginQuests.description: List of Quests required to begin the Quest

completed.description: Whether the Quest needs to be completed or just launched

beginReceiveItems.description: List of Items received when launching the Quest

endNPC.description: ID of the NPC completing the Quest

endNeededItems.description: List of Items required to complete the Quest

endTimeLimit.description: Maximum time in seconds to complete the Quest

endTalkNPC.description: ID of the NPC to talk to before completing the Quest

endVisitPlace.description: Place to visit before completing the Quest

endKillMonsters.description: List of Monsters to kill before completing the Quest

monster.description: ID of the Monster to kill

endRemoveItems.description: List of Items removed when completing the Quest

count.description: Number of items removed. If the value is absent then all items with the ID are removed from the player's inventory

endReceiveGold.description: Amount of Penya received when completing the Quest. If the value is null then the player will receive Penya but the amount is hidden

endReceiveExperience.description: Amount of experience in % given to the player completing the Quest on a specific level. If the value is null then the player will receive experience but the amount is hidden

endReceiveInventorySpaces.description: Inventory spaces unlocked when completing the Quest. If the value is null then the player will unlock spaces but the amount is hidden

endReceiveSkillPoints.description: Skill points received when completing the Quest. If the value is null then the player will receive Skill points but the amount is hidden

endReceiveKarma.description: Karma recovered when completing the Quest. If the value is null then the player will recover Karma but the amount is hidden

endReceiveItems.description: List of Items received when completing the Quest. If the value is null then the player will receive items but they are hidden

soulLinked.description: Whether the item is Soul-Linked to the character or not

descriptionComplete.description: Description of the Quest once it has been completed

dialogsBegin.description: List of Dialogs when the NPC presents the Quest to the player

dialogsAccept.description: List of Dialogs when the player accepts the Quest

dialogsDecline.description: List of Dialogs when the player declines the Quest

dialogsComplete.description: List of Dialogs when the player completes the Quest

dialogsFail.description: List of Dialogs when the player fails to complete the Quest

minPoints.description: Minimum karma points required to have this Karma level

maxPoints.description: Maximum karma points required to have this Karma level

nameColor.description: Color of the player name with this Karma level

flying.description: Whether the player can fly or not

guardAttack.description: Whether guards attack the player or not

deathExpLoss.description: Factor in % on the experience lost when the player dies

karmaRecoveryInterval.description: Interval in seconds to automatically recover a karma point

width.description: Width of the World in meters

height.description: Height of the World in meters

tileName.description: Name of the world Tiles for navigator

flying.description: Whether players can fly in the World or not

pk.description: Whether players can kill other players in the World or not

inDoor.description: Whether the World has a sky or not

revivalWorld.description: ID of the World where players revive when they die in the World

revivalKey.description: ID of the Lodestar where players revive when they die in the World

town.description: Whether the Continent is a Town or not

transy.description: ID of the Male/Female counterpart EquipSet

bonus.description: Special Abilities when the player wears several parts of the Set

equipped.description: Number of parts required to apply the Ability

accountWide.description: Whether the Achievement is shared per Account

value.description: Value to reach to complete the Level

name.description: Name of the Level when there is one

title.description: Title unlocked when completing the Level

attackPower.description: Permanent attack power boost in % against the monsters of the list when completing the Level

inventorySpaces.description: Inventory spaces unlocked when completing the Level

gold.description: Amount of Penya received when completing the Level

items.description: List of items received when completing the Level

soulLinked.description: Whether the item is Soul-Linked to the character or not

mainMonster.description: ID of the main Monster to kill

monsters.description: List of all Monsters that can be killed to complete the Achievement

mainItem.description: ID of the main Item to use

items.description: List of all Items that can be used to complete the Achievement

stats.description: List of all parameters that can be reached to complete the Achievement

mainSkill.description: ID of the main Skill to use

skills.description: List of all Skills that can be used to complete the Achievement

mainClass.description: ID of the main Class to reach

classes.description: List of all Classes that can be reached to complete the Achievement

subcategory.description: Sub category of the Item when there is one

class.description: ID of the Class required to equip or use the Item

level.description: Player level required to equip or use the Item

sex.description: Player sex required to equip or use the Item

stack.description: Number of units that can be stacked

buyPrice.description: Purchase price of the Item at NPC

sellPrice.description: Selling price of the Item at NPC

consumable.description: Whether the Item is a consumable or not

premium.description: Whether the Item is considered as premium or not

deletable.description: Whether the Item can be deleted or not

tradable.description: Whether the Item can be traded or not

shining.description: Whether the 3D Model of the Item has a shining effect or not

durationRealTime.description: Whether the Buff duration is counted even when the player is offline or not

transy.description: ID of the Male/Female counterpart Item when it is an armor

cooldown.description: Time in Seconds to use the Item again

casting.description: Time in Seconds to equip or use the Item

duration.description: Duration in Seconds of the Buff

flightSpeed.description: Flying Speed in km/h when the Item is a flying vehicle

guildContribution.description: Amount of Guild contribution experience given when the Item is a Booty

attackSpeed.description: Attack Speed when the Item is a weapon

attackRange.description: Maximum distance in meters to hit the target when the Item is a weapon

twoHanded.description: Whether the item is two handed or not when the Item is a weapon

minAttack.description: Minimum Attack when the Item is a weapon

maxAttack.description: Maximum Attack when the Item is a weapon

additionalSkillDamage.description: Additional Damage when using a Skill with the weapon

consumedMP.description: Consumed Mana Points when doing a Charged Attack with the wand

consumedItem.description: Category of the Item consumed when attacking with the weapon

triggerSkill.description: ID of the Skill that can be triggered when using the Item

triggerSkillProbability.description: Probability in % to trigger the Skill when using the Item

minDefense.description: Minimum Defense when the Item is an armor

maxDefense.description: Maximum Defense when the Item is an armor

blinkwingTarget.description: Teleport position when the Item is a blinkwing

abilities.description: Special Abilities applied to the player when wearing or using the Item

location.description: Main location where the item drops directly on the ground

spawns.description: Locations where the item drops directly on the ground

class.description: ID of the Class required to use the Skill

level.description: Player level required to use the Skill

magic.description: Whether the Skill is Magic or not

combo.description: Where the Skill can be placed in the Action Slot

debuff.description: Whether the Skill is used to attack/debuff the target or not

flying.description: Whether the Skill can be used while flying or not

passive.description: Whether the Skill is automatically used or not

consumedItem.description: Category of the Item consumed when using the Skill

triggerSkill.description: ID of the Skill that can be triggered when using the Skill

skillPoints.description: Number of Skill Points consumed by Skill Level

weapon.description: Sub category of the Weapon required to use the Skill

level.description: Minimum required level of the Skill

minAttack.description: Minimum Attack if the Skill hits the target

maxAttack.description: Maximum Attack if the Skill hits the target

damageMultiplier.description: Factor applied to the damage value done by the Skill

probability.description: Probability in % to apply the Skill effect

probabilityPVP.description: Probability in % to apply the Skill effect in PvP

flyBackProbability.description: Probability in % to make the target fly back in the air

consumedMP.description: Consumed Mana Points when using the Skill

consumedFP.description: Consumed Fatigue Points when using the Skill

cooldown.description: Time in Seconds to use the Skill again

casting.description: Time in Seconds to cast the Skill

duration.description: Duration in Seconds of the Buff

durationPVP.description: Duration in Seconds of the Buff in PvP

dotTick.description: Interval in Seconds between the Damage Over Time

spellRange.description: Maximum distance in meters to use the Skill on the target

wallLives.description: Number of times that the wall can hit when the Skill is Psychic Wall

reflectedDamagePVE.description: Reflected Damage in % when the Skill is Reflex Hit in PvE

reflectedDamagePVP.description: Reflected Damage in % when the Skill is Reflex Hit in PvP

abilities.description: Special Abilities applied to the target when using the Skill

scalingParameters.description: Skill parameters scaling with one of the player stats

parameter.description: Parameter increased by the stat. Can be one of the Skill abilities, duration or attack.

stat.description: Player stat used for the scaling

scale.description: Scaling factor. The value added to the parameter is the player stat multiplied by this factor. If the parameter is duration then the unit is the Second.

pvp.description: Whether the scaling is applied in PvP or not

pve.description: Whether the scaling is applied in PvE or not

level.description: Party level required to use the Party Skill

consumedPoints.description: Consumed Party Points when using the Party Skill

duration.description: Duration in Seconds of the Party Skill when it is a Buff

area.description: Type of area where the Monster spawns

booty.description: ID of the booty Item dropped by the Monster

mineral.description: ID of the mineral Item collected on the Catcher Monster

flying.description: Whether the Monster is flying or not

hitRate.description: Ability of the Monster to inflict a successful hit to its target

parry.description: Ability of the Monster to receive a Miss from its attacker. This value is equivalent to lowering the attacker's hitRate

runaway.description: Whether the Monster can run away when its Hit Points are low or not

summoned.description: List of Monsters which can be summoned by the Monster

berserkThresholdHP.description: Threshold in % of Hit Points to activate the Monster's berserk mode

berserkAttackPower.description: Attack Power bonus in % when Monster's berserk mode is active

recoveryThresholdHP.description: Threshold in % of Hit Points to recover the Monster's Hit Points

recoveryAmountHP.description: Amount of Hit Points in % recovered when the threshold is reached

experience.description: Amount of experience in % given to the player killing the Monster at the same level

experienceSharing.description:
How the experience is distributed to the players
* `normal` Experience is shared by amount of Damage done to the Monster and among Party members if there is a Party
* `area` Experience is shared between all players in the area

experienceTable.description: Amount of experience in % given to the player killing the Monster alone on a specific level

minDropGold.description: Minimum amount of Penya dropped by the Monster

maxDropGold.description: Maximum amount of Penya dropped by the Monster

attacks.description: Weapons used by the Monster to attack

attackRange.description: Maximum distance in meters to hit the target

triggerSkill.description: ID of the Skill that can be triggered

triggerSkillProbability.description: Probability in % to trigger the Skill

drops.description: List of items dropped by the Monster

probabilityRange.description: Probability range in % to get the item from a killed Monster. It is the absolute probability and does not indicate the rules for the distribution of the items.

common.description: Whether the drop is common to all monsters with this level or is specific to the Monster

location.description: Main location where the monster spawns

rate.description: Whether the value is a % rate or a flat value

attribute.description: Type of Attribute when the parameter is attribute, cure or attributeimmunity

dotValue.description: Value used to compute the Damage done when attribute is poison or bleeding

dotMode.description: Method used to compute the Damage done when attribute is poison or bleeding

skill.description: ID of the Skill that has a chance to trigger when parameter is skillchance

skillLevel.description: Level of the Skill that has a chance to trigger when parameter is skillchance

pvp.description: Whether the Skill can trigger in PvP or not when parameter is skillchance

pve.description: Whether the Skill can trigger in PvE or not when parameter is skillchance

weaponAttack.description: Attack bonus in % when the upgraded item is a Weapon

helmetDefense.description: Defense bonus in % when the upgraded item is an Helmet

suitDefense.description: Defense bonus in % when the upgraded item is a Suit

gauntletDefense.description: Defense bonus in % when the upgraded item is a Gauntlet

bootsDefense.description: Defense bonus in % when the upgraded item is Boots

shieldDefense.description: Defense bonus in % when the upgraded item is a Shield

setAbilities.description: Special Abilities applied to the player when all his equipment has the upgrade level

continent.description: ID of the Continent in the world

Spawn.description: Object spawn area in the world

left.description: Lower X coordinate in the world

right.description: Upper X coordinate in the world

top.description: Lower Z coordinate in the world

bottom.description: Upper Z coordinate in the world

continent.description: ID of the Continent in the world

aggressivity.description: Probability in % that a spawned monster is aggressive
